title: Bug 19089 - No popup menu in java editor ruler (Photon)
description: Bug 19089 - There is no popup menu in the java editor ruler in Photon.
OB: When working with the java editor in Photon, there is no popup menu appearing when right-clicking on the left vertical ruler.
EB:
1) Open a java editor
2) Right click on the left vertical ruler
Expected behavior: A popup menu should appear, allowing the user to add breakpoints/marks, etc.
Actual behavior: No popup menu is displayed.
SR:
1) Open a java editor
2) Right click on the left vertical ruler
3) Verify if a popup menu appears

Expected result: A popup menu should appear, allowing the user to add breakpoints/marks, etc.

Actual result: No popup menu is displayed.
